thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Le 18 Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely, clean and helpful
thread.title_full: Lovely, clean and helpful - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Le 18 Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LauraMelv
title: Lovely, clean and helpful
text:
Loved this hotel, the decor is very modern and the staff are very helpful! We stayed two nights in this hotel, got given a room with a lovely view and offered breakfast every morning.
I would happily stay here again if I went back to Paris! Thank you for being so welcoming!
